page.name: Literacy Tools Are Everywhere
page.content:
Supports for literacy and expression, such as speech-to-text and text-to-speech, are often built into the devices adult learners are already using every day, like smartphones and tablets. With practice, adult learners can find the settings that work best for them, such as choosing their favorite voice, the best rate of speech, and other options for creating a personalized experience just for them. 

Learn more about text-to-speech and other built-in literacy supports by visiting the additional resources listed below:
